title: Stream: Gold Panda – Trust EP
body:
Constantly reinventing the sound that he helped to pioneer, UK producer **Gold Panda** has just dropped his newest release, the _**Trust EP**_.

Featuring the self-titled single, it’s choppy, atmospheric and far more diverse than his debut LP, not to mention leagues ahead of the vast majority of his contemporaries. Check out _**Trust EP**_ in full below.
